definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Craze is an important form of polymer damage.
sentences.chinese: 银纹是高聚物损伤的重要表现形式。

sentences.english: Emulsion polymerization is an important method to produce high polymer.
sentences.chinese: 乳液聚合是生产高聚物的重要方法。

sentences.english: The thermodynamical properties of polymers are studied using a BP artificial neural network model.
sentences.chinese: 用前馈多层神经网络方法研究了高聚物的热力学性质。

sentences.english: High polymers such as polyacrylamide etc. can effectively inhibit water sensitivity of clay.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯酰胺等高聚物可有效地抑制粘土的水敏性。

sentences.english: The crazing phenomenon is unique to amorphous glassy polymers.
sentences.chinese: 银纹化是玻璃态高聚物所特有的一种现象。

sentences.english: What are they made of some kind of elastic biopolymer adhesive?
sentences.chinese: 这是什么做的一种有弹性的生物高聚物粘胶？

sentences.english: The rheological and viscoelastic behavior of polymer melts in the die zone are expounded.
sentences.chinese: 论述了高聚物熔体在喷丝孔区的流变性及粘弹行为。

sentences.english: The biopolymer polyhydroxyalkanoate came next on the list.
sentences.chinese: 接下来轮到生物高聚物聚羟基脂肪酸酯。

sentences.english: What are they made of, some kind of elastic biopolymer adhesive?
sentences.chinese: 它们是用什么做的，一种弹性生物高聚物粘合剂？

sentences.english: Recent advances in LCPs′study at home and abroad were also summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了近年来国内外对液晶高聚物的研究进展。

sentences.english: The new synthesized organo-tin polymers can be used as head stabilizers for PVC products.
sentences.chinese: 新合成的有机锡高聚物可以作为PVC热稳定剂使用。

sentences.english: Crazing is a typical kind of nonlinear deformation in brittle polymers.
sentences.chinese: 银纹化是脆性高聚物的一种典型的非线性变形方式。

sentences.english: Characteristics of thermotropic liquid crystal polymers used as high-performance moulded products are commented.
sentences.chinese: 评价了热致液晶高聚物作为高性能成型材料的特点。

sentences.english: A high polymer is a very large aggregation of units .
sentences.chinese: 一个高聚物是许多单元的非常大的组合。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare doxorubicin loaded N-octyl-N'-succinyl chitosan micelles and study the in vitro anti-tumor activity.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备阿霉素高聚物胶束并研究其体外抗肿瘤活性。

sentences.english: This is no viscous solvent evaporation of polymer-based sealant material.
sentences.chinese: 这是以溶剂挥发后无粘性高聚物为基料的密封胶。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
